Class AccessDB

dataAccessLayer.AccessDB
public class AccessDB
extends Object
Author:
Leonties Dan Alexandru This class creates the connection to the database

  • Method Details

    • setSel

      public void setSel​(String sel)
      Creates the "Select * from table" command
      Parameters:
      sel - SQL Query which will contain the phrase "Select * from ..."

    • connectToDB

      public Connection connectToDB()
      Creates the connection to the DataBase with the url, username and password
      Throws:
      SQLException - If connection to the DB is not possible

    • updateConn

      public void updateConn()
      Updates the connection parameter of the AccessDB object

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection​(Connection conn)
      Closes the connection to the DB
      Parameters:
      conn - Connection that needs to be closed
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is no connection to close

    • createStmt

      public Statement createStmt​(Connection conn)
      Creates the statement after connecting to the DB
      Parameters:
      conn - Connection that needs to be used to create the Statement
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the statement cannot be created

    • updateStmt

      public void updateStmt()
      Updates the statement parameter of the AccessDB object

    • closeStmt

      public void closeStmt​(Statement stmt)
      Closes the statement
      Parameters:
      stmt - Statement that needs to be closed
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is no statement to close

    • createResSel

      public ResultSet createResSel​(Statement stmt, String sel)
      Creates the ResultSet after creating the statement
      Parameters:
      stmt - Statement that has already been created is used
      sel - SQL Query used for creating the ResultSet
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • execUpd

      public void execUpd​(String sql)
      Executes the SQL Query, used to change information in the table : insert, delete, edit
      Parameters:
      sql - The SQL Query that will be used
      Throws:
      SQLException - In case the SQL Query cannot be executed

    • updateResSel

      public void updateResSel​(String sel)
      Updates the SQL Query String
      Parameters:
      sel - String used to update the SQL Query

    • closeRes

      public void closeRes​(ResultSet res)
      Closes the ResultSet
      Parameters:
      res - The ResultSet that will be closed
      Throws:
      SQLException - In case there is no ResultSet to close
